text: gumazir kam uan nɨghnɨzibara ifuegha uabɨra uabɨ fe, egha bizitam gɨfozir puvatɨ. A nɨghnɨzir kuram ikia, ariava onganizɨ moghɨn, akabar gumazibagh afighasa, egha pura bizir muziariba bagha akabar uari adoghadosi. Akar kamaghɨn amiba, da gumazibagh amima men naviba gumazir igharaziba bagha men derazir puvatɨ, egha uari abɨgha, egha gumazibar ziabagh asɨghasɨgha, egha nɨghnɨzir kurabar igharaz darazigh amuava,
